subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Kevin Bieksa scored two goals, Roberto Luongo made 29 saves and the Canucks beat the Blackhawks, who lead the Western Conference semifinal, 3-2.
snippet: Kevin Bieksa scored two goals, Roberto Luongo made 29 saves and the Canucks beat the Blackhawks, who lead the Western Conference semifinal, 3-2.
